trans-unit.source: The API in Detail
trans-unit.target: 세부적인 API

trans-unit.source: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().
trans-unit.target: API는 ListView 및 PathView 와 같은 뷰의 API와 유사합니다 . 모델 및 대리인이 설정 될 수 있으며, 계산 및 currentItem 속성은보기에 대한 정보에 대한 읽기 전용 액세스를 제공합니다. 뷰를 특정 인덱스에 배치 하려면 positionViewAtIndex ()를 사용하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().
trans-unit.target: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().

trans-unit.source: The API is similar to that of views like ListView and PathView; a model and delegate can be set, and the count and currentItem properties provide read-only access to information about the view. To position the view at a certain index, use positionViewAtIndex().

The API is split into sub-modules, which provide QML and C++ interfaces for specific purposes. They focus mainly on Map and Place information. The required position data can be retrieved using the QtPositioning module.
trans-unit.target: API는 하위 모듈로 분할되어 특정 목적을 위해 QML 및 C ++ 인터페이스를 제공합니다. 주로지도 및 장소 정보에 중점을 둡니다. QtPositioning 모듈을 사용하여 필요한 위치 데이터를 검색 할 수 있습니다 .

trans-unit.source: The API of QStyle contains functions that draw the widgets, static helper functions to do common and difficult tasks (e.g., calculating the position of slider handles) and functions to do the various calculations necessary while drawing (e.g., for the widgets to calculate their size hints). The style also helps some widgets with the layout of their contents. In addition, it creates a QPalette that contains QBrushes to draw with.
trans-unit.target: QStyle 의 API 에는 위젯을 그리는 기능, 일반적이고 어려운 작업을 수행하는 정적 도우미 기능 (예 : 슬라이더 핸들의 위치 계산) 및 드로잉하는 동안 필요한 다양한 계산을 수행하는 기능 (예 : 위젯이 크기를 계산하는 기능)이 포함되어 있습니다. 힌트). 이 스타일은 또한 일부 위젯의 컨텐츠 레이아웃에 도움이됩니다. 또한 그릴 QBrush es 가 포함 된 QPalette 를 만듭니다 .

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls 2 aims to be clean and simple. Common operations are easy, and more advanced ones are liberally documented with snippets that can be copied into your code.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Controls 2의 API는 깨끗하고 단순합니다. 일반적인 작업은 쉽고, 고급 작업은 코드에 복사 할 수있는 스 니펫으로 자유롭게 문서화됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls 2 is very similar to Qt Quick Controls 1, but it does come with some changes necessary to facilitate the improvements. The majority of changes are to do with styling; all of a control's delegates are now accessible in the control itself, instead of in a separate style object.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick Controls 2의 API는 Qt Quick Controls 1과 매우 유사하지만 개선을 촉진하는 데 필요한 몇 가지 변경 사항이 있습니다. 대부분의 변경은 스타일과 관련이 있습니다. 컨트롤의 모든 대리자는 이제 별도의 스타일 개체 대신 컨트롤 자체에서 액세스 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls aims to be clean and simple. Common operations are easy, and more advanced ones are liberally documented with snippets that can be copied into your code.
trans-unit.target: The API of Qt Quick Controls aims to be clean and simple. Common operations are easy, and more advanced ones are liberally documented with snippets that can be copied into your code.

trans-unit.source: The API of Qt Quick Controls is very similar to Qt Quick Controls 1, but it does come with some changes necessary to facilitate the improvements. The majority of changes are to do with styling; all of a control's delegates are now accessible in the control itself, instead of in a separate style object.
trans-unit.target: The API of Qt Quick Controls is very similar to Qt Quick Controls 1, but it does come with some changes necessary to facilitate the improvements. The majority of changes are to do with styling; all of a control's delegates are now accessible in the control itself, instead of in a separate style object.

trans-unit.source: The API of the STL iterators is modelled on pointers in an array. For example, the ++ operator advances the iterator to the next item, and the * operator returns the item that the iterator points to. In fact, for QList and QStack, which store their items at adjacent memory positions, the iterator type is just a typedef for T *, and the const_iterator type is just a typedef for const T *.

The API of the STL iterators is modelled on pointers in an array. For example, the ++ operator advances the iterator to the next item, and the * operator returns the item that the iterator points to. In fact, for QVector and QStack, which store their items at adjacent memory positions, the iterator type is just a typedef for T *, and the const_iterator type is just a typedef for const T *.
trans-unit.target: STL 반복자의 API는 배열의 포인터에서 모델링됩니다. 예를 들어, ++ 연산자는 반복자를 다음 항목으로 진행시키고 * 연산자는 반복자가 가리키는 항목을 반환합니다. 실제로 인접한 메모리 위치에 항목을 저장하는 QVector 및 QStack의 경우 반복자 유형은 T * 에 대한 typedef 이고 const_iterator 유형은 const T * 에 대한 typedef입니다 .

trans-unit.source: The API works just like with QStringList, as shown in the previous section.
trans-unit.target: API 는 이전 섹션에서와 같이 QStringList 와 동일하게 작동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ASCII Compatible Encoding (ACE) is defined by RFC 3490, RFC 3491 and RFC 3492. It is part of the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) specification, which allows for domain names (like "example.com") to be written using international characters.
trans-unit.target: ACE (ASCII 호환 인코딩)는 RFC 3490, RFC 3491 및 RFC 3492에 의해 정의됩니다. 도메인 이름 (예 : "example.com" )을 작성할 수있는 IDNA (Internationalize Domain Names in Applications) 사양의 일부입니다. 국제 문자 사용.

trans-unit.source: The ASCII-Compatible Encoding (ACE) is defined by RFC 3490, RFC 3491 and RFC 3492. It is part of the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) specification, which allows for domain names (like "example.com") to be written using international characters.
trans-unit.target: ACE (ASCII 호환 가능 인코딩)는 RFC 3490, RFC 3491 및 RFC 3492에 의해 정의됩니다.이 응용 프로그램은 국제화 도메인 이름 응용 프로그램 (IDNA) 사양의 일부이며 도메인 이름 (예 : "example.com" )을 허용합니다. 국제 문자를 사용하여 작성되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The ASN.1 object identifier that specifies which extension this is.
trans-unit.target: 이것이 어떤 확장자인지를 지정하는 ASN.1 객체 식별자.

trans-unit.source: The AT client uses three basic concepts to acquire information about any accessible object in an application:
trans-unit.target: AT 클라이언트는 세 가지 기본 개념을 사용하여 응용 프로그램에서 액세스 가능한 개체에 대한 정보를 얻습니다.

trans-unit.source: The AbstractTexture class shouldn't be used directly but rather through one of its subclasses. Each subclass implements a given texture target (2D, 2DArray, 3D, CubeMap ...) Each subclass provides a set of functors for each layer, cube map face and mipmap level. In turn the backend uses those functor to properly fill a corresponding OpenGL texture with data. It is expected the functor does as minimal processing as possible so as not to slow down textures generation and upload. If the content of a texture is the result of a slow procedural generation process, it is recommended not to implement this directly in a functor.
trans-unit.target: The AbstractTexture class shouldn't be used directly but rather through one of its subclasses. Each subclass implements a given texture target (2D, 2DArray, 3D, CubeMap ...) Each subclass provides a set of functors for each layer, cube map face and mipmap level. In turn the backend uses those functor to properly fill a corresponding OpenGL texture with data. It is expected the functor does as minimal processing as possible so as not to slow down textures generation and upload. If the content of a texture is the result of a slow procedural generation process, it is recommended not to implement this directly in a functor.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveX server could not shut down properly when the last client stopped using it. It usually takes about two seconds for the application to terminate, but you might have to use the task manager to kill the process (e.g. when a client doesn't release the controls properly).
trans-unit.target: 마지막 클라이언트가 사용을 중지했을 때 ActiveX 서버가 제대로 종료되지 않았습니다. 일반적으로 응용 프로그램을 종료하는 데 약 2 초가 걸리지 만 작업 관리자를 사용하여 프로세스를 종료해야 할 수도 있습니다 (예 : 클라이언트가 제어를 제대로 해제하지 않은 경우).

trans-unit.source: The Address QML type represents a specific location as a street address. More...

trans-unit.source: The Address has a text property which holds a formatted string. It is the recommended way to display an address to the user and typically takes the format of an address as found on an envelope, but this is not always the case. The text may be automatically generated from constituent address properties such as street, city and and so on, but can also be explicitly assigned. See text for details.
trans-unit.target: Address에는 형식화 된 문자열을 보유하는 text 속성이 있습니다. 사용자에게 주소를 표시하는 것이 권장되는 방법이며 일반적으로 봉투에있는 주소 형식을 사용하지만 항상 그런 것은 아닙니다. 텍스트는 자동으로 다음과 같은 구성 주소 속성에서 생성 될 수있는 거리 , 도시 등등과하고, 또한 명시 적으로 할당 할 수 있습니다. 자세한 내용은 텍스트 를 참조하십시오.

trans-unit.source: The Age affector allows you to alter where the particle is in its lifecycle. Common uses are to expire particles prematurely, possibly giving them time to animate out.
trans-unit.target: Age effector를 사용하면 입자의 수명주기 위치를 변경할 수 있습니다. 일반적인 용도는 파티클을 조기에 만료시켜 애니메이션화 할 시간을 제공하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Age affector is also sometimes known as a 'Kill' affector, because with the default parameters it will immediately expire all particles which it affects.
trans-unit.target: 에이지 이펙터는 때때로 '킬 (Kill)'이펙터라고도합니다. 기본 매개 변수를 사용하면 영향을받는 모든 입자가 즉시 만료되기 때문입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Age affector only applies to particles which are still alive.
trans-unit.target: 에이지 이펙터는 아직 살아있는 입자에만 적용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The Animation type cannot be used directly in a QML file. It exists to provide a set of common properties and methods, available across all the other animation types that inherit from it. Attempting to use the Animation type directly will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 애니메이션 유형은 QML 파일에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다. 상속되는 다른 모든 애니메이션 유형에서 사용할 수있는 일련의 공통 속성 및 메서드를 제공합니다. 애니메이션 유형을 직접 사용하려고하면 오류가 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AnimationOptions type is a typedef for QFlags<AnimationOption>. It stores an OR combination of AnimationOption values.

trans-unit.source: The Animator type cannot be used directly in a QML file. It exists to provide a set of common properties and methods, available across all the other animator types that inherit from it. Attempting to use the Animator type directly will result in an error.

trans-unit.source: The Balsam tool also has support for converting projects created with Qt 3D Studio into Qt Quick 3D QML projects.
trans-unit.target: The Balsam tool also has support for converting projects created with Qt 3D Studio into Qt Quick 3D QML projects.

trans-unit.source: The Balsam tool is a command line application that is part of Qt Quick 3D's asset conditioning pipeline. The purpose is to take assets created in digital content creation tools like Maya, 3ds Max, or Blender and convert them into an efficient runtime format for use with Qt Quick 3D. It is not possible, nor does it make sense to reference the interchange formats directly in applications because a large amount of resources are needed to parse and condition the content of the asset before it is usable for realtime rendering. Instead the interchange formats can be converted via the Balsam tool into QML Components and resources like geometry and textures.
trans-unit.target: The Balsam tool is a command line application that is part of Qt Quick 3D's asset conditioning pipeline. The purpose is to take assets created in digital content creation tools like Maya, 3ds Max, or Blender and convert them into an efficient runtime format for use with Qt Quick 3D. It is not possible, nor does it make sense to reference the interchange formats directly in applications because a large amount of resources are needed to parse and condition the content of the asset before it is usable for realtime rendering. Instead the interchange formats can be converted via the Balsam tool into QML Components and resources like geometry and textures.

trans-unit.source: The Basic style is a basic all-round style.

The Basic style is a simple and light-weight style that offers the maximum performance for Qt Quick Controls. It is built with a minimal amount of Qt Quick primitives, and keeps animations and transitions to the minimum.

The Bearer Management API controls the system's connectivity state. This incorporates simple information such as whether the device is online and how many interfaces there are as well as enables the application developer to start, stop network interfaces and influences other connection specific details. Depending on the platform's capabilities it may even provide session management so that a network interface remains up for as long as clients have a registered interest in them while at the same time optimizes the interface's uptime.
trans-unit.target: Bearer Management API는 시스템의 연결 상태를 제어합니다. 여기에는 장치가 온라인 상태인지 여부 및 인터페이스 수와 같은 간단한 정보가 통합되어 있으며 응용 프로그램 개발자가 네트워크 인터페이스를 시작, 중지하고 다른 연결 별 세부 정보에 영향을 줄 수 있습니다. 플랫폼의 기능에 따라 세션 관리 기능을 제공하여 클라이언트가 등록 된 관심을 갖고있는 동시에 네트워크의 가동 시간을 최적화하는 한 네트워크 인터페이스를 유지할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The Big5 codec provides conversion to and from the Big5 encoding. The code was originally contributed by Ming-Che Chuang <mingche@cobra.ee.ntu.edu.tw> for the Big-5+ encoding, and was included in Qt with the author's permission, and the grateful thanks of the Qt team. (Note: Ming-Che's code is QPL'd, as per an mail to qt-info@nokia.com.)
trans-unit.target: Big5 코덱은 Big5 인코딩과의 변환을 제공합니다. 이 코드는 원래 Big-5 + 인코딩을 위해 Ming-Che Chuang <mingche@cobra.ee.ntu.edu.tw>에 의해 기고되었으며, 작성자의 허락과 함께 Qt에 포함되었으며 Qt 팀의 감사에 감사했습니다. (참고 : Ming-Che의 코드는 qt-info@nokia.com으로 보내는 메일에 따라 QPL입니다.)

trans-unit.source: The Big5 is currently implemented as a pure subset of the Big5-HKSCS codec, so more fine-tuning is needed to make it identical to the standard Big5 mapping as determined by Li18nux-Big5. See http://www.autrijus.org/xml/ for the draft Big5 (2002) standard.
trans-unit.target: Big5는 현재 Big5-HKSCS 코덱의 순수한 하위 집합으로 구현되므로 Li18nux-Big5에 의해 결정된 표준 Big5 매핑과 동일하게하려면 더 미세한 조정이 필요합니다. Big5 (2002) 표준 초안 은 http://www.autrijus.org/xml/ 을 참조 하십시오 .

trans-unit.source: The Big5-HKSCS codec provides conversion to and from the Big5-HKSCS encoding.
trans-unit.target: Big5-HKSCS 코덱은 Big5-HKSCS 인코딩과의 변환을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The C++ QWebChannel API makes it possible to talk to any HTML client, which could run on a local or even remote machine. The only limitation is that the HTML client supports the JavaScript features used by qwebchannel.js. As such, one can interact with basically any modern HTML browser or standalone JavaScript runtime, such as node.js.
trans-unit.target: C ++ QWebChannel API를 사용하면 로컬 또는 원격 시스템에서 실행될 수있는 HTML 클라이언트와 대화 할 수 있습니다. HTML 클라이언트가 qwebchannel.js 에서 사용하는 JavaScript 기능을 지원한다는 점만 다릅니다 . 따라서 기본적으로 최신 HTML 브라우저 또는 node.js와 같은 독립형 JavaScript 런타임과 상호 작용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The C++ QWebChannel API makes it possible to talk to any HTML client, which could run on a local or even remote machine. As such, one can interact with basically any modern HTML browser or standalone JavaScript runtime, such as node.js.
trans-unit.target: The C++ QWebChannel API makes it possible to talk to any HTML client, which could run on a local or even remote machine. The only limitation is that the HTML client supports the JavaScript features used by qwebchannel.js . As such, one can interact with basically any modern HTML browser or standalone JavaScript runtime, such as node.js.

trans-unit.source: The C++ language doesn't support variable-length arrays on the stack. For example, the following code won't compile:
trans-unit.target: C ++ 언어는 스택에서 가변 길이 배열을 지원하지 않습니다. 예를 들어 다음 코드는 컴파일되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The C++ source file generated by moc must be compiled and linked with the implementation of the class.
trans-unit.target: moc 에 의해 생성 된 C ++ 소스 파일 은 클래스 구현과 컴파일 및 링크되어야합니다.

trans-unit.source: The C++ specific configuration variables are provided to avoid erroneous documentation due to non-standard C++ constructs.
trans-unit.target: 비표준 C ++ 구문으로 인한 잘못된 문서화를 피하기 위해 C ++ 특정 구성 변수가 제공됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The CA certificate database can be extended and customized with QSslConfiguration::addCaCertificate(), QSslConfiguration::addCaCertificates().
trans-unit.target: The CA certificate database can be extended and customized with QSslConfiguration::addCaCertificate(), QSslConfiguration::addCaCertificates().

trans-unit.source: The CA certificate database can be extended and customized with addCaCertificate(), addCaCertificates(), addDefaultCaCertificate(), addDefaultCaCertificates(), and QSslConfiguration::defaultConfiguration().setCaCertificates().
trans-unit.target: CA 인증서 데이터베이스는 addCaCertificate (), addCaCertificates (), addDefaultCaCertificate (), addDefaultCaCertificates () 및 QSslConfiguration :: defaultConfiguration (). setCaCertificates ()를 사용 하여 확장하고 사용자 정의 할 수 있습니다 .

trans-unit.source: The CA certificate database is used by the socket during the handshake phase to validate the peer's certificate.
trans-unit.target: CA 인증서 데이터베이스는 핸드 셰이크 단계 중에 소켓에서 피어의 인증서를 확인하는 데 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The CABARC tool from Microsoft can easily generate CAB archives:
trans-unit.target: Microsoft의 CABARC 도구는 CAB 아카이브를 쉽게 생성 할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The CAN Bus API provides some common API to access the CAN devices:
trans-unit.target: CAN 버스 API는 CAN 장치에 액세스하기위한 몇 가지 일반적인 API를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CAN bus frame can have a base or an extended frame format.
trans-unit.target: CAN 버스 프레임은 기본 또는 확장 프레임 형식을 가질 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The CAN bus frame must use the base frame format (11 bit identifier).
trans-unit.target: CAN 버스 프레임은 기본 프레임 형식 (11 비트 식별자)을 사용해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CAN bus frame must use the extended frame format (29 bit identifier).
trans-unit.target: CAN 버스 프레임은 확장 프레임 형식 (29 비트 식별자)을 사용해야합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CAN bus is offline.
trans-unit.target: CAN 버스가 오프라인 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The CAN bus status is unknown (e.g. not supported by the CAN plugin).
trans-unit.target: The CAN bus status is unknown (e.g. not supported by the CAN plugin).

trans-unit.source: The CAN controller is fully operational
trans-unit.target: The CAN controller is fully operational

trans-unit.source: The CAN controller is in bus off status (disconnected from the CAN bus)
trans-unit.target: The CAN controller is in bus off status (disconnected from the CAN bus)

trans-unit.source: The CAN controller is in error status (no longer sending CAN frames)
trans-unit.target: The CAN controller is in error status (no longer sending CAN frames)

trans-unit.source: The CAN controller is in warning status
trans-unit.target: The CAN controller is in warning status

trans-unit.source: The CBOR URL type is an extended type represented by a string tagged as an Url.
trans-unit.target: CBOR URL 유형은 Url 태그가 지정된 문자열로 표시되는 확장 유형 입니다.

trans-unit.source: The CBOR UUID type is an extended type represented by a byte array tagged as an Uuid.
trans-unit.target: CBOR UUID 유형은로 태그 바이트 배열로 표현되는 확장 타입 UUID .

trans-unit.source: The CBOR built-in types are:
trans-unit.target: CBOR 내장 유형은 다음과 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: The CBOR date/time types are extension types using tags: either a string (in ISO date format) tagged as a DateTime or a number (of seconds since the start of 1970, UTC) tagged as a UnixTime_t. When parsing CBOR streams, QCborValue will convert UnixTime_t to the string-based type.
trans-unit.target: CBOR 날짜 / 시간 유형은 태그를 사용하는 확장 유형입니다. DateTime으로 태그가 지정된 문자열 (ISO 날짜 형식) 또는 UnixTime_t 로 태그가 지정된 숫자 (1970 년 시작 이후 초) 입니다. CBOR 스트림을 구문 분석 할 때 QCborValue 는 UnixTime_t 를 문자열 기반 유형으로 변환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CBOR date/time types are extension types using tags: either a string (in ISO date format) tagged as a DateTime or a number (of seconds since the start of 1970, UTC) tagged as a UnixTime_t. When parsing CBOR streams, QCborValue will convert UnixTime_t to the string-based type.
trans-unit.target: The CBOR date/time types are extension types using tags: either a string (in ISO date format) tagged as a DateTime or a number (of seconds since the start of 1970, UTC) tagged as a UnixTime_t. When parsing CBOR streams, QCborValue will convert UnixTime_t to the string-based type.
